'''Alpha v1.0.1''',<ref>{{ytl|7HZLzz13B6k|Minecraft secret friday update the third|LouisWasTaken|July 2, 2010}}</ref> also known as '''Seecret Friday 3''', is the second version and first [[Java Edition Alpha]] version of the [[Seecret Updates]], released on July 2, 2010, in which, various items added and changes were made.<ref>[[wordofnotch:763147353|Seecret Friday update the third! OooooOOOoo!]] – The Word of Notch, July 2, 2010</ref> It is the first version truly named "Alpha" as [[Java Edition Infdev 20100630-1835|Alpha v1.0.0]] was only called "Alpha" retroactively upon the release of v1.0.1.

|Redstone Dust

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Iron Door JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Iron door]]'''
* Can only be controlled by redstone power.
* Crafted with [[iron]].
{{Crafting table
|A1=Iron Ingot
|A2=Iron Ingot
|A3=Iron Ingot
|B1=Iron Ingot
|B2=Iron Ingot
|B3=Iron Ingot
|Output=Iron Door
}}

'''[[File:Wall Lever (S) JE1.png|32px]] [[Lever]]'''
* Can be switched to provide redstone power.
* Crafted with [[stick]] and [[cobblestone]].
{{Crafting table
|A2=Stick
|A3=Cobblestone
|Output=Lever
}}

'''[[File:Redstone Dust JE1 BE1.png|32px]] {{Animate|Inactive Redstone Wire (NS) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (EW) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (NE) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (ES) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (SW) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (NW) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (NEW) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (NES) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (ESW) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (NSW) JE1.png; Inactive Redstone Wire (NESW) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (NS) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (EW) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (NE) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (ES) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (SW) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (NW) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (NEW) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (NES) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (ESW) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (NSW) JE1.png; Active Redstone Wire (NESW) JE1.png|32px}} [[Redstone Dust]]'''
* Replaces existing gears in a world as they share the same numeric ID of 55.
* Redstone dust as a placed block has two power appearances; either completely on, or completely off.
* At the time, it was not given a name.

'''[[File:Redstone Ore JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Redstone Ore]]'''
* Redstone ore mined using an iron pickaxe or higher drops 4 or 5 redstone dust.
* The mining time of redstone ore takes far longer compared to other ores (4.5 seconds with iron pickaxe).

'''[[File:Redstone Torch JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Redstone Wall Torch (W) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Redstone Torch]]'''
* Can provide redstone power.
* Redstone torches emit flame particles when lit.
* Crafted with [[redstone dust]] and [[stick]].
{{Crafting table
|A2=Redstone Dust
|A3=Stick
|Output=Redstone Torch
}}

'''[[File:Stone Button (item) JE1.png|32px]] [[Stone Button]]'''
* Can be pushed to provide redstone power.
* Crafted with [[stone]].
{{Crafting table
|Output=Stone Button|A2=Stone|A3=Stone
}}

'''[[File:Stone Pressure Plate JE1.png|32px]] [[Stone Pressure Plate]]'''
* Can be pushed to provide redstone power.
** Can detect only players and mobs.
* Crafted with [[stone]].
{{Crafting table
|A3=Stone
|B3=Stone
|C3=Stone
|Output=Stone Pressure Plate
}}

'''[[File:Oak Pressure Plate JE1.png|32px]] [[Wooden Pressure Plate]]'''
* Can be pushed to provide redstone power.
** Can detect all entities.
* Crafted with [[oak planks]].
{{Crafting table
|A3=Oak Planks
|B3=Oak Planks
|C3=Oak Planks
|Output=Oak Pressure Plate
}}

=== General ===
'''[[Particles (Java Edition)|Particles]]'''
* Added {{code|reddust}}, {{code|snowballpoof}}, {{code|largeexplode}}, and {{code|portal}}.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Cobblestone Stairs (inventory) JE2.png|32px]] [[Cobblestone Stairs]]'''
* Item texture changed from [[File:Cobblestone (texture) JE2 BE1.png|32px|class=pixel-image]].

'''[[File:Lit Furnace (S) JE1.png|32px]] [[Lit Furnace]]'''
* Now drops a regular furnace when mined instead of a lit furnace.

'''[[File:Monster Spawner JE1.png|32px]] [[Monster Spawner]]s'''
* Does not drop as an item upon being mined.

'''{{Animate|Red Mushroom JE2.png;Brown Mushroom JE2.png|32px}} [[Mushroom]]s'''
* Generate anywhere.
* If generated in sunlight, eventually pop off.
** Don't pop off at night.

'''[[File:Oak Sign (0) JE2.png|32px]] [[Sign]]s'''
* Can now be placed on the sides of [[block]]s.
* Smaller and non-solid.

'''[[File:Oak Door (item) JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Wooden Door]]'''
* Item texture changed from [[File:Oak Door (item) JE1.png|32px]]

'''[[File:Oak Stairs (inventory) JE2.png|32px]] [[Wooden Stairs]]'''
* Item texture changed from [[File:Oak Planks (texture) JE3 BE1.png|32px|class=pixel-image]].

=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* Improved [[mob AI]].

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Gold Ore JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Gold Ore]]'''
* It is generated twice as often.

'''[[File:Diamond Ore JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Diamond Ore]]'''
* It is generated twice as often.
* Blobs are slightly smaller.

== Removals ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Clockwise Gear (N).gif|32px]] [[Gear]]s'''
* Removed and replaced by the newly added redstone.
** This means that gears placed on worlds turn into redstone or pop off, depending on how they were placed.</onlyinclude>
